@description.name: @description
@description.body: Abstract for all transport implementations

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event when a request is created

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event when a request is configured

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event when a request is send

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event when a request is received

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event when a request is completed

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event when a request is aborted

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event when a request has failed

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event when a request has timed out

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Target url to issue the request to

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Determines what type of request to issue

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Set the request to asynchronous

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Set the data to be sent via this request

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Username to use for HTTP authentication

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Password to use for HTTP authentication

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The state of the current request

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Request headers

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Request parameters to send.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Request form fields to send.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Response Type

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Use Basic HTTP Authentication

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The owning object

@description.name: @description
@description.body: {String} The ID of the object.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sending a request. This method is virtual and concrete subclasses are supposed to implement it.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Force the transport into the aborted state ("aborted"). Listeners of the "aborted" signal are notified about the event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Force the transport into the timeout state ("timeout"). Listeners of the "timeout" signal are notified about the event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Force the transport into the failed state ("failed"). Listeners of the "failed" signal are notified about the event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Add a request header to this transports qx.io.remote.Request. This method is virtual and concrete subclasses are supposed to implement it.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the request header of the request. This method is virtual and concrete subclasses are supposed to implement it.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Provides an hash of all response headers. This method is virtual and concrete subclasses are supposed to implement it.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the current status code of the request if available or -1 if not. This method is virtual and concrete subclasses are supposed to implement it.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Provides the status text for the current request if available and null otherwise. This method is virtual and concrete subclasses are supposed to implement it.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Provides the response text from the request when available and null otherwise. By passing true as the "partial" parameter of this method, incomplete data will be made available to the caller. This method is virtual and concrete subclasses are supposed to implement it.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Provides the XML provided by the response if any and null otherwise. By passing true as the "partial" parameter of this method, incomplete data will be made available to the caller. This method is virtual and concrete subclasses are supposed to implement it.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the length of the content as fetched thus far. This method is virtual and concrete subclasses are supposed to implement it.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Apply method for "state" property. For each state value a corresponding event is fired to inform the listeners.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxOwner. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.
